description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

Intraday_Bank_StatementObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Intraday_Bank_StatementObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Intraday_Bank_StatementObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to an existing Bank Statement for update only purposes.

Intraday_Bank_Statement_Data.description: Bank Statement Reference ID. This is the Bank Statement Data unique identifier.

validation.validation: Enter BAI2 and BTRS type codes with only numeric characters that aren't all zeroes, and reload the bank statement.

Intraday_Bank_Statement_Transaction_Data.description: This Element contains Type code for Intraday Bank Statement Account Transactions.

validation.validation: Enter BAI2 and BTRS type codes with only numeric characters that aren't all zeroes, and reload the bank statement.

Intraday_Bank_Statement_Transaction_Data.description: Represents the status of the Intraday Bank Statement Transaction . Can be blank or  have values "PNDG" or "Book".

validation.validation: Enter a Valid Status for the Intraday Bank Statement Transaction.
validation.description: Returns false if invalid Bank Statement Transaction status is provided.

description: This element contains all Intraday Bank Statement Data

validation.validation: If the currency is specified, it must match the currency for Bank Account.
validation.description: If the currency is specified, it must match the currency for Bank Account.

validation.validation: Workday cannot determine the Company from information on the imported bank statement, such as the customer account number or IBAN; bank routing number; and bank code/ID or BIC.
validation.description: Workday cannot determine the Company from information on the imported bank statement, such as the customer account number or IBAN; bank routing number; and bank code/ID or BIC.

validation.validation: Workday cannot determine the Bank Account Number from information on the imported bank statement, such as the customer account number or IBAN; bank routing number; and bank code/ID or BIC.
